entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 07:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
